caption.title: Ly6C hi monocytes and NK cells in CCR2-DTR mice express CFP.
caption.p: CFP expression in (A) Ly6C hi monocytes (Ly6C hiCD11b +CD43 +Ly6G -), (B) NK cells (NK1.1 +CD11b +Ly6C -Ly6G -), and (C) neutrophils (Ly6G +CD11b +CD43 +Ly6C +) in the blood of WT (CCR2-DTR-CFP -) (n = 3) and CCR2-DTR-CFP + (n = 5) C57BL/6 mice was determined by flow cytometry.
Click here for additional data file.
